comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Swaps items between two different slots within containers.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Zero-based index of the slot to swap from this container.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Zero-based index of the slot to swap with.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Target container to swap with. Note this can be the same container as this source.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: Throws if either this container or `otherContainer` are invalid or if the `slot` or `otherSlot` are out of bounds.
